wiki.content:
"Move Bitch" is a 2002 single off rapper Ludacris' album Word of Mouf. The single features Mystikal and I-20. The single reached #10 on the Billboard Hot 100 making it Ludacris's first top ten hit on the chart, it also reached #3 on Hot Rap Tracks, and #3 on Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks. Three 6 Mafia later did a remix of the song featuring Lil Jon.
 Puerto Rican reggaeton duo Maicol & Manuel sampled the song on "Hoy Me Levanté" on their 2002 release Yakaleo.
 
 The song is also featured in episode 2, Series One of British teen comedy/drama Skins. The song was also used by World Wrestling Entertainment superstar Montel Vontavious Porter during his short stint in Ring of Honor. It was also used for April Hunter in various Independent circuits. It was featured in the movie ATL starring T.I., and 'Hancock,' although in the latter, the clean version was used. The lines "Move bitch, get out the way" are referenced in one saying of a Pedestrian in the 2004 video game Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. A snippet of the song is played during traffic reports on many radio stations, usually carrying an urban/hip-hop format. Retired NBA star and now ESPN analyst Jalen Rose is featured in the music video.
 The song has been covered by rock band Start Trouble, on their album Every Solution Has Its Problem
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

Three 6 Mafia later did a remix of the song featuring Lil Jon.

comments: Pretty much the theme whenever I'm driving [3]
"Retired NBA star and now ESPN analyst Jalen Rose is featured in the music video." @ 2:08!

Good stuff, I remember listening to this shit with my brother in his car when I was like 6/7
Pretty much the theme whenever I'm driving
Mystikal is the only reason to listen to this song. and i like Luda's verse...lol
I SING THIS WHEN PEOPLE IN FRONT OF ME DRIVE SLOW. IT SEEMS TO HAPPEN RELATVELY OFTEN SO MAYBE I AM JUST SPEEDING EVERYWHERE
chris brown's theme song when he was slapping around rihanna
Im doin a hundred on the highway, so if you do the speed limit get the FUCK OUTTA MY WAY
